features.title: Godot 4 Game Engine Integration
features.objective: Godot 4 physics and rendering for React Native (iOS, Android, Web)
progress: GameBridge.gd singleton for TypeScript â†” Godot communication
Physics body management and entity spawning
features.notes: Core game engine is operational. Documentation exists in docs/godot-migration/

features.title: AI-Powered Game Generation
features.objective: AI-powered game generation from natural language prompts using entity/behavior systems
progress: Entity system with templates and behaviors
Multiple asset types: entity, background, title_hero, parallax
Game templates: fallingCatcher, hillRacer, jumpyCat, stackAttack, ballLauncher
features.notes: Documentation in docs/game-maker/. Asset pipeline fully documented in docs/asset-generation-knowledge.md

features.title: Type-Driven Asset Generation Pipeline
features.objective: AI-generated game sprites, backgrounds, and title images with physics-aware silhouette generation
progress: Scenario.com API integration (img2img, txt2img, background removal)
Debug output for all pipeline stages
Godot sprite scaling logic for square textures
features.notes: Comprehensive documentation in docs/asset-generation-knowledge.md and docs/asset-pipeline.md

features.title: Storybook + NativeWind Setup
features.objective: Web-based component previews with full NativeWind (Tailwind CSS) styling support

features.title: DevMux Service Orchestration
features.objective: Managed tmux sessions for long-running development processes (Metro, API, Storybook)
progress: DevMux configuration for Metro (:8085), API (:8789), Storybook (:6006)
Automatic service coordination (e.g., pnpm ios ensures Metro is running)
features.notes: Documented in app/AGENTS.md. Configuration in devmux.config.json

features.title: Universal Lazy Registry System
features.objective: Type-safe, auto-discovered module loading for examples and other registerable components

humanTasks.title: Implement AI Generation API Call
humanTasks.context: AIGenerateModal has a TODO placeholder for actual AI generation API call. Currently simulates generation with a 1.5s delay.
humanTasks.whyHumanRequired: Requires decision on which AI API to use and how to integrate it with the existing game generation system.

humanTasks.title: Implement Sheet Prompt Builder
humanTasks.context: buildSheetPrompt function returns 'TODO: implement sheet prompt'. This is for sprite sheet generation.
humanTasks.whyHumanRequired: Requires design decision on how sprite sheets should be prompted and generated, likely similar to individual sprite generation but with layout considerations.

patterns.title: Platform-Specific Module Pattern
patterns.description: Use .web.ts and .native.ts extensions for platform-specific implementations with a unified index.ts export

patterns.title: Documentation Taxonomy
patterns.description: Structured documentation types: guides/ (how-to), reference/ (APIs), architecture/ (design), decisions/ (ADRs), troubleshooting/ (fixes), log/ (temporal updates), plans/ (roadmaps)

patterns.title: Asset Pipeline Debug Output
patterns.description: Save intermediate files for each pipeline stage to api/debug-output/{gameId}/{assetId}/ with descriptive filenames like {stage}_{artifact}.{ext}
